display_name: Immediate-Release Ccbs (Nifir Or Dihir Or Verir Or Dltir) (SHHS2)
description: Patient taking IMMEDIATE-RELEASE CCBS = NIFIR OR DIHIR OR VERIR OR DLTIR within two weeks of the SHHS2 visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.

hybrid.LABEL: IMMEDIATE-RELEASE CCBS = NIFIR OR DIHIR OR VERIR OR DLTIR
